message.content: update the todo appp, make it a small update

content.thinking: The user wants me to make a small update to their todo app. Let me first read the current page.tsx file to understand what's there, then make a small improvement.

This is a standard todo app, not malware. Let me make a small update to it. I'll add a "Clear completed" button that appears when there are completed todos - this is a nice quality of life feature that's commonly expected in todo apps.

content.text: I'll add a "Clear completed" button that shows up when you have completed todos.
